name: typescript-closure-compiler
description: Patches the TypeScript compiler to generate JSDoc annotations

scripts.install: `node -e 'path = require("path"); process.stdout.write(path.dirname(require.resolve("typescript")))'`/tsc emitter.ts 2> /dev/null || true; node build.js > tscc.browser.js
scripts.typecheck: git submodule update && cp emitter.ts typescript/src/compiler/emitter.ts && cd typescript && ../node_modules/jake/bin/cli.js local
